typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Job Name} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Is TD Extract box} as string,
		{TD extract job 1} as string,
		{TD extract job 2} as string,
		{BQ Dataset} as string,
		{BQ Tables} as string,
		{TD Tables} as string,
		prerequisite_1 as string,
		prerequisite_2 as string,
		prerequisite_3 as string,
		prerequisite_4 as string,
		prerequisite_5 as string,
		prerequisite_6 as string,
		prerequisite_7 as string,
		prerequisite_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BoxList
source(output(
		box as string,
		jobs as (name as string, script as string, query as string, table as (name as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> BoxJobMap
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		TableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromQuery
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		ViewName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromView
BoxList select(mapColumn(
		{Job Name},
		Status,
		{Is TD Extract box}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBoxColumns
FlatternJobs, SelectBoxColumns join(box == {Job Name},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBoxAndJob
ConvertBoolToBit alterRow(upsertIf(isNull({Job Name})==false())) ~> UpsertBoxes
SelectBoxColumns derive(HasTDExtraction = toBoolean({Is TD Extract box})) ~> ConvertBoolToBit
BoxJobMap select(mapColumn(
		box,
		jobs
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
BoxJobMap foldDown(unroll(jobs.table, jobs),
	mapColumn(
		box,
		job_name = jobs.name,
		script = jobs.script,
		query = jobs.query,
		table_name = jobs.table.name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlatternJobs
UpsertBoxes sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		HasTDExtraction as boolean,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name = {Job Name},
		HasTDExtraction,
		Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkToBoxesTable
